mapper.select: SELECT SEQ,TITLE,PRICE,DELIVERY,DISCOUNT,PHOTO,SALE_CNT,STORE_CNT,SUM FROM ITEM WHERE SEQ LIKE #{seq};
SELECT * FROM item_option WHERE ITEM_SEQ LIKE #{seq};
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.seq desc) AS NUM, A.* FROM review A )B WHERE B.NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY B.NUM;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REVIEW WHERE SEQ LIKE #{seq};
